means.word_mean: 1. the brightest star in Ursa Minor; at the end of the handle of the little dipper; the northern axis of the earth points toward it

auth_sentence.content: We were girls who also unconsciously set our gauge of a man's character to that impossibly perfect polestar, Atticus Finch.
